name: LFGSwap Finance
description: LFGSwap is a community-driven organization built to solve what might be called the “liquidity problem.” One could define this problem as the inability of disparate forms of liquidity to connect with markets in a decentralized way, and vice versa. While other solutions provide incrementally progressive advances toward solving the problem of liquidity, LFGSwap’s progress is intended to create a broader range of network effects. Rather than limiting itself to a single solution, LFGSwap intertwines many decentralized markets and instruments.
